title: Easy Whiskey Slush
directions: Stir pineapple juice, whiskey, and maraschino cherries with their juice in a large freezer-safe container with a lid. Cover container tightly and freeze slush overnight.
Scoop the whiskey slush into old-fashioned glasses, making sure each glass contains a cherry or two. Top with lemon-lime soda.
ingredients: 1 (10 ounce) jar maraschino cherries with juice
